sense.def:
Z izrazom
it is possible to do something
hočemo povedati, da je nekaj mogoče narediti.

seg.quote: It is possible for us to measure his progress.
They are doing everything possible to take care of you.
Whenever possible, loads were flown in.
‘When do you want to go?’—‘This weekend, if possible.’

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
as soon as possible
, tisto naredimo takoj, ko je mogoče. Kadar dobimo
as much as possible of something
, dobimo toliko tistega, kolikor je največ mogoče.

seg.quote: I like to know as much as possible about my patients.
He sat as far away from the others as possible.

sense.def:
Izraz
possible
uporabljamo s presežnikom pridevnikov, kadar želimo poudariti, da ima nekaj določeno lastnost v večjem obsegu kot vsi drugi predmeti ali pojavi iste vrste.

seg.quote: We provide the best possible accommodation for our students.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
it is possible that something is true or correct
hočemo povedati, da obstaja možnost, da je nekaj res ali prav.

seg.quote: It is possible that he said these things.

sense.def:
Dogodek, ki je
possible
, se bo morda zgodil.

seg.quote: His staff warned him of the possible consequences.

sense.def:
Kadar za nekoga rečemo, da je na primer
a possible Prime Minister
, to pomeni, da po našem mnenju lahko postane ministrski predsednik.

seg.quote: America and Russia were both possible financiers of the dam.
